Many things can contribute to this isolation including: the passing of a spouse and close friends, the proximity of their children, and their ability to drive and move around. Although, social isolation is detrimental to everyone, it is especially concerning for seniors. In fact, the CDC considers loneliness and isolation to be a serious health risk to seniors.  ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Assisted living communities can provide a solution to your loved one’s social isolation. In addition, assisted living communities provide daily activities and communal meals where your loved can get out of their room and enjoy their day in the company of others. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The communities aim to provide a variety of activities to meet every resident need including: games, fitness, happy hour, crafts, art, outing and entertainment. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Your loved one could be taking a yoga class in the morning, learning about nutrition through a workshop with a trained professional before lunch, playing brain games in the afternoon, and meditating before dinner. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"They get the benefit of all these great resources without feeling intimidated or nervous, because all the other people around them are their same age. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Assisted living communities offer a solution. The goal being to provide their residents with an increased quality of life and give them the opportunity to enjoy their later years hanging out with their friends and engaging in enjoyable activities. item.title: What are the benefits of assisted living?
item.thumbText: Image of several elderly women sitting at a table playing a game.
item.metaDescription: Assisted living communities are ever changing. They evolve to meet the needs of those entering their care today. In this article we explore the benefits.
item.seoKeywords: senior advice, assisted living benefits, reduced social isolation, more free time, peace of mind
item.author: Dawn Bare
